# PRACTICE/OVERVIEW
```yaml
curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/KojoRising/CKA_Prep/main/abbreviated_alias.sh > alias.sh && source alias.sh
```

1) Try curling the API-Server  (if you're on the same)
```yaml
root@controlplane ~ âœ– curl https://localhost:6443 -k
{
  "kind": "Status",
  "apiVersion": "v1",
  "metadata": {},
  "status": "Failure",
  "message": "forbidden: User \"system:anonymous\" cannot get path \"/\"",
  "reason": "Forbidden",
  "details": {},
  "code": 403
}

```

2) Disable Anonymous Access | Add `--anonymous-auth=false` flag to the kube-apiserver
```yaml
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    kubeadm.kubernetes.io/kube-apiserver.advertise-address.endpoint: 10.45.61.6:6443
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    component: kube-apiserver
    tier: control-plane
  name: kube-apiserver
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  containers:
  - command:
    - kube-apiserver
    - --anonymous-auth=false
    - --advertise-address=10.45.61.6
    - --allow-privileged=true
    - --authorization-mode=Node,RBAC
...
```

apiVersion: certificates.k8s.io/v1
kind: CertificateSigningRequest
metadata:
  name: 60099@internal.users
spec:
  request: 
  signerName: kubernetes.io/kube-apiserver-client
  expirationSeconds: 86400  # one day
  usages:
  - client auth
